subject: Horse Racing
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: The reigning New York-bred Horse of the Year, Giant Ryan, was euthanized after developing the same disease that led to the death of 2006 Kentucky Derby winner Barbaro.
snippet: The reigning New York-bred Horse of the Year, Giant Ryan, was euthanized after developing the same disease that led to the death of 2006 Kentucky Derby winner Barbaro.
